narrative_prompt:
The perpetual downpour lacquered the chrome canyons of Neo-Kyoto, each drop reflecting the garish glow of a thousand holographic advertisements. Jax "Glitch" Rourke, trench coat collar pulled high, squinted through the drizzle, his faulty optical implant flickering erratically as he watched a sleek black aerocar whisper into the alley across the street. Corporate shadows danced long and deep in this city, and tonight, theyâ€™d swallowed another soul.
